text:
Hey, when bulk enrolling records into a workflow, is there any execution order? can't find any information regarding that.
for example: I've created a workflow for tickets that copies data to their associated company, i want to make sure each company has the latest ticket information, can I promise that with bulk enrollment?

When creating a workflow and selecting starting from a template there is one that does something similar already that you could start with which may help you creating your own that does what you want.
